vote.title: To create the Columbus Housing Community Reinvestment Area (CHCRA); to authorize real property tax exemptions as authorized by Chapter 3735 of the Ohio Revised Code (ORC); to provide that the City’s existing Community Reinvestment Area Housing Council shall serve as the Housing Council for the CHCRA; to designate the Housing Administrator as the Housing Officer for the CHCRA; and to repeal various ordinances establishing or amending currently existing Community Reinvestment Areas that will be absorbed into the boundary of the CHCRA. (AMENDED BY ORD. 1393-2024 PASSED 5/20/2024) (Amended by Ord. 1908-2025 passed on 7/28/2025 -LG)
